metadata.description: prettyboyshav is the first artist drop on AlbumTradingCards. Embodying the spirit of freedom, joy, and light, his album 'too pretty for sunshine' has surpassed ten million streams independently. Be a founding supporter of his journey by owning one of the first hundred 'too pretty for sunshine' cards. Each digital trading card is paired with a personally encoded physical trading card that comes with a piece of prettyboyshav's sweater from the 'white nails' music video.
metadata.name: too pretty for sunshine
